selected_skills.name: compare_chart_values
selected_skills.purpose: To compare the y-coordinate value at x = 3 with 0 to determine if it is greater.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use the skill to input the y-coordinate value at x = 3 and 0, and get a boolean result indicating if the y-coordinate is greater than 0.

new_skill_specs.name: map_boolean_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: To map a boolean result to the corresponding multiple-choice option.
edge_cases: If boolean_value is neither True nor False, return an error or default option.
